TQQQ_synthetic.method: B: QQQ 일간수익률로 가상 TQQQ(3x 일일리셋) 합성
TQQQ_synthetic.dividend_handling: NOT included (QQQ close prices, not adjusted for dividends)
TQQQ_synthetic.scaling: Synthetic prices scaled to match real TQQQ open on transition date
TQQQ_synthetic.note: This is NOT a simple rename (method A); it's a proper 3x daily reset simulation

SPLG_synthetic.method: SPY proxy before 2012, then scaled to match SPLG at transition

source_data.1999-03-11 to 2005-02-24: Synthetic SPY from QQQ with beta adjustment (BETA=0.65)

SPLG_synthetic.scaling: All proxy prices scaled to match SPLG open on 2012-01-03

pseudo_code: # Backward propagate from first real BIL price

safe_asset_gap_1999_2007.handling: Synthetic BIL with 2% annual constant growth
